home.title: piscina Swimming Pools
home.subtitle: Complete swimming pool solutions – design, equipment, and services
home.aboutText: At piscina, we provide the latest swimming pool solutions from design, installation and maintenance, along with a complete range of high-quality equipment.
home.filtersDesc: High-quality filters for water purification and maintaining its cleanliness.
home.pumpsDesc: Powerful and energy-efficient pumps for water circulation and maintaining continuous movement.
home.heatersDesc: Energy-efficient heaters to enjoy swimming year-round.
home.contactText: Contact us by phone, WhatsApp, or email.
home.whyQualityDesc: We use the finest materials and international equipment to ensure high and lasting quality.
home.whyExperienceDesc: Over 15 years of experience in designing, installing, and maintaining swimming pools.
home.whySupportDesc: Specialized technical support team available 24/7 to serve you.
home.testimonial1: Excellent service and amazing design for my pool. I recommend piscina to anyone who wants a high-quality pool.
home.testimonial2: Professional team and continuous follow-up. The pool has been working perfectly for over two years.
home.poolDesignDesc: Innovative and modern design for residential and commercial pools with safety and beauty in mind
home.regularMaintenanceDesc: Comprehensive maintenance plans to keep your pool efficient and clean year-round
home.equipmentSupplyDesc: All spare parts and original equipment to ensure the best performance for your swimming pool
home.faq1: How long does it take to build a pool?
home.faq1Answer: The time varies depending on the size and complexity of the pool, but it usually takes 4-8 weeks for regular home pools.
home.faq2: What is the monthly maintenance cost of the pool?
home.faq2Answer: The cost ranges between 200-500 SAR monthly depending on the pool size and type of equipment used.
home.faq3: Do you offer warranty on products?
home.faq3Answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive warranty on all our products and services ranging from 1 to 5 years depending on the product type.
home.maintenanceEquipmentDesc: All tools and equipment needed for pool maintenance
home.lightingSystemsDesc: Underwater and exterior lighting to add a beautiful touch
home.poolDesignServiceDesc: Innovative and modern design for residential and commercial pools

about.title: About Us
about.text: At piscina, we bring years of experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining swimming pools. We are committed to providing the best innovative solutions using the latest equipment and finest materials to ensure a distinctive and safe swimming experience.
about.visionText: To be pioneers in the swimming pool industry, providing modern and advanced solutions that meet our customers' needs and exceed their expectations.
about.missionText: To provide high-quality products and services while maintaining trust and transparency, building long-term relationships with our customers.
about.videoText: We bring years of experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining swimming pools. We are committed to providing the best innovative solutions using the latest equipment and finest materials to ensure a distinctive and safe swimming experience.

products.title: Products & Services
products.subtitle: At piscina, we provide you with a comprehensive range of products and services that ensure a safe and enjoyable swimming experience. All our products are carefully selected from the best international and local brands.
products.filtersDesc: High-quality filters for purifying water from impurities and suspended materials, ensuring pool water purity year-round.
products.pumpsDesc: Powerful and energy-efficient pumps for water circulation and maintaining continuous movement that helps keep water clean and healthy.
products.heatersDesc: Effective pool heaters that maintain optimal water temperature so you can enjoy swimming year-round, even in winter.
products.equipmentDesc: All the tools and equipment you need for pool maintenance, from cleaning nets to essential chemicals.
products.lightsDesc: Underwater and external lighting systems to add a beautiful and stunning touch to your pool at night.
products.designText: We design your pool with the latest technologies while considering safety, beauty, and comfort.
products.maintenanceText: We provide comprehensive maintenance plans to keep your pool efficient and clean year-round.
products.supplyText: We provide all spare parts and original equipment to ensure the best performance for your swimming pool.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are happy to hear from you to answer all your inquiries and meet your swimming pool and product needs.
contact.workingHoursDesc: We are available to serve you at the following times:
